__e: If you want my advice, don't show up at the Major's in the future.
Stop it, Kelly, you're making her hairophobic.

It's just that i'm having those dreams again... and i'm frightened dad's going to come into those dreams looking like that.
Are you trying to tell me that you want me to be in your movie?
Once I send back my return, how long does it take for the credit to appear on my account?
Some Tom, Dick or Harry comes to the door and you've got your hat on?
As long as you get on television, talk about it afterwards.
If it isn't in the first day, the chances are won't be in the second.
Here we is, you and me, asking our fortune from the tea.
Look on payday, at least show up at Tony's place to meet him, okay?

Drop in and see us sometime, will you?

I'm surely glad you don't drop in every morning.
